title: Taos the Wizard Mouse
description: Taos is a mouse wizard with green eyes, who likes to solve different tasks using his magic knowledge.In the 2nd book, Taos receives a letter from his good friend, a cat, who needs his help. But the wizard mouse will have to fight a fire snake and for this, he needs a magic bean from a bear... and this is how the mouse start a new adventureIn one night, before midnightTaos was reading a scroll by the candlelight.This is a graphical book and it is written in rhymes. It is a book that can be read on any hour, however, I recommend the bed night moment.â€‹
author: Evory Salieri
